summary: The document discusses how AI can benefit small businesses by highlighting opportunities without overextending resources. It emphasizes the importance of identifying goals and promoting a data-driven culture while considering scalability.
content_preview:
When you run a small
business, you
understand how
limitations can prevent
you from reaching your
full potential.
  Limited resources
mean you must choose
where to invest time,
money, and energy.
Will analytics be one
of those investments? Given the fact that
your business has
limited resources, you
need to promote a
data-driven culture
without hurting your
sustainability. Before going ahead with AI, you need
to clarify your goals as a company.
This will allow you to have a clear view
